    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbandonedShipAnnounceState
    Class representing an Announce State of the AbandonedShipCard.
    AbandonedShipCard
    Represents an "Abandoned Ship" card in the game.
    AbandonedShipRewardState
    Class representing a Reward State of the AbandonedShipCard.
    AbandonedStationAnnounceState
    Class representing an Announce State of the AbandonedStationCard.
    AbandonedStationCard
    Represents an "Abandoned Station" card game.
    AbandonedStationRewardState
    Class representing a Reward State of the AbandonedStationCard.
    AlienLifeSupportComponent
    AlienLifeSupportComponent
    AlienType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported crew types in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    AlienTypeAlreadyPresentException
     
    AlreadyPoweredException
     
    AlreadyVisitedException
     
    ArgumentTooBigException
     
    BaseComponent
    Abstract class representing a server side component tile.
    BatteryComponent
    BatteryComponent
    BatteryPiece
    Represents a Battery owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side BatteryComponent.
    BatteryType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of BatteryComponent in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    CabinComponent
    CabinComponent
    CabinVisitor
    Visitor used to verify what AlienType a CabinComponent can support.
    CannonComponent
    CannonComponent
    CannonType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of CannonComponent in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    Card
    Abstract class representation of an adventure card.
    CardAlreadyExhaustedException
     
    CardOrder
    Enumeration representing the two possible orders a iCard might apply its effect to the players.
    CardState
    Abstract class representing a State of the Card.
    CargoPiece
    Represents a ShipmentType owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side StorageComponent.
    ClientAwaitConfirmCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the list of players the model is awaiting a response from.
    ClientBaseCardState
    Base client side card state, contains info about the card id it represents, and the card class name.
    ClientBaseComponent
    Client side component containing the info about its id and rotation.
    ClientBatteryComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its battery contents.
    ClientBrokenVerifyComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator marking it as broken or invalid.
    ClientCabinComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the crew inside it.
    ClientCannonComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its cannon's power and direction.
    ClientCardState
    Interface representing a client side CardState, that can display its info.
    ClientCardStateFormatter
    Formatter that builds an attributed string containing all info regarding the state of a card during VoyageState.
    ClientCardStateVisitor
    Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientCardState.
    ClientCargoPenaltyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a cargo penalty applied to a specified player.
    ClientCargoRewardCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a cargo reward applied to a specified player.
    ClientCombatZoneIndexCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the index and section info of a combat zone card.
    ClientComponent
    Interface representing a client side BaseComponent , that can display its info.
    ClientComponentVisitor
    Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientComponent.
    ClientConnection
    Interface representing any possible Server-side connection to a remote Client actor.
    ClientConstructionPlayer
    Client side representation of a player during a ConstructionState
    ClientConstructionState
    Client side representation of a ConstructionState.
    ClientConstructionStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientConstructionState.
    ClientController
    Represents the client side controller in charge of managing all logic regarding connection and view interfacing.
    ClientControllerState
    Abstract class representing a State of the ClientController.
    ClientCreditsRewardCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a credit reward applied to a specified player.
    ClientCrewPenaltyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying a crew penalty applied to a specified player.
    ClientDescriptor
    Represents a unique Client connected to the server, can be tied to a Player object and to a ClientConnection.
    ClientDisconnectMessage
    Client message forcing a disconnection from the remote game server.
    ClientEmptyComponent
    Empty client side component.
    ClientEndgamePlayer
    Client side representation of a player during a EndscreenState
    ClientEndgameState
    Client side representation of a EndscreenState.
    ClientEndgameStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientEndgameState.
    ClientEnemyCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an enemy info, power, and penalty in case of loss against it.
    ClientEngineComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its engine's power and direction.
    ClientGameListEntry
    An entry into any list of ModelInstance that must be displayed to the player.
    ClientLandingCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying possible landing locations and their rewards.
    ClientLargeComponentPrinter
    Formatter that builds a string matrix displaying a large ClientComponent tile.
    ClientLifeSupportComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the alien type it can support.
    ClientLobbySelectState
    Client side representation of the lobby selection screen.
    ClientLobbyStatesFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientLobbySelectState or ClientSetupState.
    ClientMessage
    Message to be received on the client.
    ClientMeteoriteCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an incoming meteorite, its direction and size.
    ClientNewCenterCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying the list of players the model is awaiting the selection of a ship part from.
    ClientPoweredComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing information about its powered state.
    ClientProjectileCardStateDecorator
    Client side card state decorator displaying an incoming shot, its direction and size.
    ClientSetupState
    Client side representation of the lobby creation screen.
    ClientShieldComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the directions it is shielding.
    ClientShipmentsComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the cargo it contains.
    ClientSmallComponentPrinter
    Formatter that builds a string displaying a small ClientComponent tile.
    ClientSpaceShip
    Client side representation of a spaceship and its stats.
    ClientSpaceShipFormatter
    Formatter that displays an entire ClientSpaceShip, of selected size, and its info.
    ClientState
    Interface representing a client side {GameState, that can display its info.
    ClientStateOverlayFormatter
    Formatter that displays all secondary info of a provided ClientState.
    ClientStateVisitor
    Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientState.
    ClientVerifyPlayer
    Client side representation of a player during a VerifyState
    ClientVerifyState
    Client side representation of a VerifyState.
    ClientVerifyStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientVerifyState.
    ClientView
    Interface representing a client side view.
    ClientVoyagePlayer
    Client side representation of a player during a VoyageState
    ClientVoyageState
    Client side representation of a VoyageState.
    ClientVoyageStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientVoyageState.
    ClientWaitingPlayer
    Client side representation of a player during a WaitingState
    ClientWaitingRoomState
    Client side representation of a WaitingState.
    ClientWaitingRoomStateFormatter
    Formatter that displays all info regarding a provided ClientWaitingRoomState.
    CombatZoneAnnounceState
    Class representing an Announce State of the CombatZoneCard.
    CombatZoneCard
    Represents a "Combat Zone" card in the game.
    CombatZoneCriteria
    Enumeration representing all possible criteria for which a CombatZoneCard may evaluate players.
    CombatZonePenalty
    Enumeration representing all possible penalties for which a CombatZoneCard may apply to players.
    CombatZonePenaltyState
    Class representing a Penalty State of the CombatZoneCard.
    CombatZoneSection
    Class representing a single section of a CombatZoneCard.
    CombatZoneSelectShipState
    Class representing a Select Ship State of the CombatZoneCard.
    CommandPreprocessor
    Class in charge of handling TUI input strings and converting them into requests to either the view or the remote game server.
    CommonBoard
    CommonBoard handles the component piles durning the building phase of the game.
    ComponentFactory
    Factory class used to create the tiles available in the physical release of Galaxy Trucker
    ComponentNotEmptyException
     
    ComponentRotation
    Enumeration that specifies all possible rotations of a component, starting up moving 90 degrees clockwise
    ComponentTile
    Abstract class representing a tile to be used in the game.
    ComponentVisitor
    Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of BaseComponent .
    ConnectedState
    Represents the state of the client after having successfully connected to the game server.
    ConnectingState
    Represents the state of the client during the process of connecting to the game server.
    ConnectionSetupTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ConnectingState.
    ConnectionType
     
    ConnectorsSizeException
     
    ConnectorType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of connectors in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    ConstructionSidePaneTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientConstructionState.
    ConstructionState
    Abstract class representing the shared construction phase logic between rulesets.
    ConstructionStateHourglass
    The hourglass used during a LevelTwoConstructionState.
    ConstructionTile
    GUI representation of a construction phase ClientComponent that allows for Drag and Drop support.
    ConsumerThread
    Thread object in charge of retrieving all received messages from the queue and processing them.
    ContainerEmptyException
     
    ContainerFullException
     
    ContainerMoveValidationVisitor
    Visitor used to validate moves of cargo between containers
    ContainerNotSpecialException
     
    ContainsLoaderVisitor
    Visitor used to load StorageComponent with a specified cargo type.
    ContainsRemoveVisitor
    Visitor used to remove cargo and batteries from BatteryComponent and StorageComponent.
    CrewPiece
    Represents a AlienType owned by a PlacedTile that represents a client side CabinComponent or derivates.
    CrewRemoveVisitor
    Visitor used to remove crew from any types of CabinComponent.
    CrewSetPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a SetCrewMessage.
    CrewSetVisitor
    Visitor used to set a CabinComponent's crew type.
    CrewSizeException
     
    DiscardCargoMessage
    Server message indicating a player action regarding the discarding of some cargo from the provided coordinates.
    DiscardComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a player action regarding the discarding of a component during construction.
    DraggablePiece
    Abstract class representing a piece that may be dragged and dropped on a PlacedTile.
    DraggablePieceDecoder
    Visitor class used to discertain what ServerMessage to generate due to a Drag and Drop event.
    EmptyComponent
     
    EndgameTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientEndgameState.
    EndscreenState
    Ending point of any completed Galaxy Trucker match, displays all scores and stats for all playing players.
    EnergyVisitor
    Visitor used to turn on/off a component.
    EngineComponent
    EngineComponent
    EngineType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of EngineComponent in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    EnterLobbyMessage
    Server message indicating a request by a client to enter a lobby.
    EnterSetupMessage
    Server message indicating a request by a client to enter lobby creation.
    EpidemicCard
    Represents the "Epidemic" adventure card in the game.
    EpidemicState
    Class representing a State of the EpidemicCard.
    ForbiddenCallException
     
    GameModeType
    Enumeration containing the values and settings for all supported Game Modes.
    GameState
    Abstract class representing the state of a game of Galaxy Trucker.
    GUIMain
     
    GUINotification
    Represents a text message to be shown on the GUI that disappears after a certain Duration.
    GUIView
    GUI implementation of ClientView.
    HelpScreenFormatter
    Formatter that displays the help screen.
    iCard
    Interface representing the contract an adventure card must respect.
    iCardFactory
    Interface representing a card factory of any level.
    iCards
    Represents a pile of iCard that can be pulled.
    iCommonBoard
    Interface representing the center board during the construction phase.
    IllegalComponentAdd
     
    IllegalTargetException
     
    iPlanche
    The planche class handles the movement of the player on the board.
    KeyboardInputThread
    Thread object in charge of reading the keypresses of the user.
    LargeMeteorVisitor
    Visitor used to check if there are any cannons pointing in the direction of a large meteor.
    LeaveSetupMessage
    Server message indicating a request by a client to leave lobby creation.
    LevelOneCardFactory
    Factory for level one flight cards.
    LevelTwoCardFactory
    Factory for level one flight cards.
    LevelTwoCards
    A pile of iCard containing both level one and two cards, and a set of cards available to see during the construction phase.
    LevelTwoConstructionState
    Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using level two flight rules, includes a ConstructionStateHourglass.
    LifeSupportUpdateVisitor
    Visitor used to check whether or not a CabinComponent's crew dies after a AlienLifeSupportComponent is destroyed.
    LobbyController
    Represents a controller in charge of controlling a single game instance, its players, the serialization of it, and the messages regarding it.
    LobbyStateTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientLobbySelectState.
    Logger
    Singleton class in charge of Logging any message to chat.
    LoggerLevel
    Enum representing the various levels a logger can print in.
    MainServerController
    Singleton class in charge of managing the opening and closing of lobbies, and the reception of each message to the respective lobby.
    MenuFormatter
    Formatter that displays all pre-connection menu screens.
    Message
    Interface representing a serializable object to be inherited by all message classes.
    MessageBuilder
    Static class that offers a method to parse strings into ServerMessage.
    MeteorAnnounceState
    Class representing an Announce State of the MeteorSwarmCard.
    MeteorSelectShipState
    Class representing a Select Ship State of the MeteorSwarmCard.
    MeteorSwarmCard
    Represents the "Meteor Swarm" adventure card in the game.
    ModelInstance
    Class represeting an entire instance of a game of Galaxy Trucker.
    MoveCargoMessage
    Server message indicating a player action regarding the moving of some cargo along the provided coordinates.
    NegativeArgumentException
     
    NetworkServer
    Represents the entry point for any incoming connection to the MainServerController, for both protocols.
    NotifyStateUpdateMessage
    Client message notifying about a remote change in the model.
    NotPresentException
     
    NotUniqueException
     
    OpenLobbyMessage
    Server message indicating a request by a client to open a lobby.
    OpenSpaceCard
    Represents the "Open Space" adventure card in the game.
    OpenSpaceState
    Class representing a State of the OpenSpaceCard.
    OpenUnfinishedMessage
    Server message indicating a request by a client to open a lobby from a save file.
    OutOfBoundsException
     
    PieceImagePathProvider
    Utility class used to retrieve the paths for the images representing each used piece.
    PingMessage
    Server message indicating a ping from a client.
    PiratesAnnounceState
    Class representing an Announce State of the PiratesCard.
    PiratesCard
    Represents the "Pirates" adventure card in the game.
    PiratesPenaltyState
    Class representing a Penalty State of the PiratesCard.
    PiratesRewardState
    Class representing a Reward State of the PiratesCard.
    PiratesSelectShipState
    Class representing a Select Ship State of the PiratesCard.
    PlacedShipTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientSpaceShip and a Planche.
    PlacedTile
    GUI representation of a placed ClientComponent that allows for Drag and Drop support.
    PlacedTileFactory
    Implementation of ClientComponentVisitor, creates a PlacedTile that represents the given ClientComponent.
    Planche
    The planche class handles the movement of the player on the board.
    Planet
    Class representing a single landing place on a PlanetCard.
    PlanetAnnounceState
    Class representing the Announce State of the PlanetCard.
    PlanetCard
    Represents a "Planet" adventure card in the game this card allows players to land on available planets and collect cargo.
    PlanetRewardState
    Class representing the Reward State of the PlanetCard.
    Player
    Player
    PlayerColor
    Enumeration representing all supported player colors.
    PlayerCount
    Enumeration representing all allowed lobby sizes.
    PlayerGiveUpMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to give up the game.
    Projectile
    Class representing a shot or meteorite that could hit a player.
    ProjectileArray
    Collection of Projectile that randomizes them automatically at construction.
    ProjectileDimension
    Enumeration representing the dimensions of a Projectile.
    ProjectileDirection
    Enumeration that specifies all possible rotations of a projectile, starting up moving 90 degrees clockwise
    PutComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to place a component at the specified coordinates and rotation.
    RedrawThread
    Thread object in charge of periodically redrawing the screen to keep up with the new information.
    RemoveComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to remove a component at the specified coordinates.
    RemoveComponentPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a RemoveComponentMessage.
    RemoveCrewMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to remove crew at the specified coordinates.
    ReserveComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to reserve a component during the construction phase.
    ResumeWaitingState
    Special subclass of WaitingState needed to restart a saved game, only allows clients with the same names as the players that were playing before the ModelInstance that owned it got closed.
    RMIClientConnection
    Server side visible type of the stub the client exports in order to connect.
    RMIClientStub
    Stub exported by the client in order for the server to have a way to communicate with the client.
    RMIConnection
    A client side RMI connection to a remote game server.
    RMIServerStubImpl
    Exported stub sent to the client in order to send messages to the server.
    SelectBlobMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to select a specific blob of the ship.
    SelectBlobPiece
    Drag and drop piece allowing for the creation of a SelectBlobMessage.
    SelectLandingMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to select a landing site.
    SelectShipReconnectState
    Class representing the selection of a ship section when a Player reconnects with a broken ship but not being retired.
    SendContinueMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to progress the game.
    SenderThread
    Thread object in charge of sending all messages to the server.
    ServerConnection
     
    ServerConnectMessage
    Server message used locally to properly notify all model layers about the connection of a player.
    ServerDisconnectMessage
    Server message indicating the disconnection of a player.
    ServerMain
     
    ServerMessage
    Message to be received on the server.
    SetCrewMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to set the crew to a specific type on the indicated coordinates.
    SetupOptionsContainer
    Utility class used to hold all info used to open a lobby, used through lambda expression captures.
    SetupTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientSetupState.
    ShieldComponent
    ShieldComponent
    ShieldType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of ShieldComponent in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    ShipCoords
    Class representing coordinates on a SpaceShip of a specified GameModeType.
    ShipmentType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of cargo in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    SlaversAnnounceState
    Class representing the Announce State of the SlaversCard.
    SlaversCard
    Represents the "Slavers" adventure card in the game.
    SlaversLoseState
    Class representing the Lose State of the SlaversCard.
    SlaversRewardState
    Class representing the Reward State of the SlaversCard.
    SmugglersAnnounceState
    Class representing the Announce State of the SmugglersCard.
    SmugglersCard
    Represents the "Smuggler" card in the game.
    SmugglersLoseState
    Class representing the Lose State of the SmugglersCard.
    SmugglersRewardState
    Class representing the Reward State of the SmugglersCard.
    SocketClient
    Server side socket interfacing with a client connected using the TCP protocol.
    SocketConnection
    A client side TCP connection to a remote game server.
    SpaceShip
    SpaceShip
    SpaceShipUpdateVisitor
    Visitor used to update a SpaceShip's stats.
    StardustCard
    Represents the "Stardust" card in the game.
    StardustState
    Class representing a State of the StardustCard.
    StartingCabinComponent
    StartingCabinComponent
    StorageComponent
    StorageComponent
    StorageType
    Enumeration that specifies the supported types of StorageComponent in this implementation of Galaxy Trucker.
    StructuralComponent
     
    TakeCargoMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to take the cargo from a reward and place it at the specified coordinates.
    TakeComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to take a component from the covered pile during the construction phase.
    TakeDiscardedComponentMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to take a component from the discarded pile during the construction phase.
    TakeRewardMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to take or refuse a credit reward.
    TerminalWrapper
    Wrapper class around a Terminal object made available by the JLine3 library.
    TestFlightCards
    A pile of iCard containing only eight specific level one cards, and no cards available to see during the construction phase.
    TestFlightConstructionState
    Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using test flight rules.
    TextMessageFormatter
    Formatter that embellishes and displays the last four TUINotification received by the TUIView.
    ThreadSafeMessageQueue<T>
    Wrapper around ArrayBlockingQueue with a ExecutorService tied to it, allowing for asyncronous inserts and takes.
    TitleScreenState
    Represents the state of the client at username selection.
    TitleScreenTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a TitleScreenState.
    ToggleHourglassMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to toggle the hourglass during the construction phase.
    TUIConnectionSetupStrategy
    Strategy to be used when connecting to a remote game server with a TUIView.
    TUIInGameStrategy
    Strategy to be used when connected to a remote game server with a TUIView.
    TUIMain
     
    TUINotification
    Represents a text message to be shown on the TUI that disappears after a certain Duration.
    TUIStrategy
    Abstract class representing how a TUIView user inputs should be handled and displayed.
    TUITitleStrategy
    Strategy to be used when the title screen is displayed.
    TUIView
    TUI implementation of ClientView.
    TurnOnMessage
    Server message indicating a request from a player to turn on a component using the specified coordinates, taking the battery from the other specified coordinates.
    UnpowerableException
     
    UnsupportedAlienCabinException
     
    UsernameSetupMessage
    Server message used during the TCP connection procedure, notifying the server about the username of the incoming connection.
    VerifyResult
    Enumeration representing all possible results the verification of a component may return.
    VerifySidePaneTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientVerifyState.
    VerifyState
    Class representing the verification phase of a Galaxy Trucker match.
    ViewMessage
    Client message containing a client bound text message from the server.
    ViewType
    Enumeration containing all supported GUI types.
    VirtualServer
    Represents a remote object with which an RMI Client is able to interface to communicate with the underlying MainServerController.
    VirtualServerProvider
    Represents an object capable of providing a VirtualServer implementation.
    VoyageSidePaneTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientVoyageState.
    VoyageState
    Space voyage phase of a match of Galaxy Trucker.
    WaitingState
    Starting point of any newly created match of Galaxy Trucker, waits for the expected number of clients and then automatically joins.
    WaitingTreeFactory
    Factory that exposes a static method to create all Nodes needed to display a ClientWaitingRoomState.
